DOC.brief_summary: To assess the multiple-dose pharmacokinetics (PK), safety and tolerability of AVP-786 (deuterated [d6] dextromethorphan hydrobromide [DM]/quinidine sulfate [Q]) in healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase-1 Study to Assess the Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Tolerability of AVP-786 in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult males 18 45 years of age BMI 18 30 kg/m2 History or presence of significant disease History of substance abuse and/or alcohol abuse with the past 3 years Use of tobaccocontaining or nicotinecontaining products within 6 months Use of any prescription or the overthecounter medications within 14 days
